metadata.title: ChordPro Feature and Bug Plan
metadata.summary: Initial analysis of the ChordPro codebase. Established architecture, dependencies, and feature inventory. Created reference items for incomplete feature mapping and test coverage gaps.

item.title: [REF] CLI pipeline mapping and coverage
item.justification: Core CLI flow is partially mapped. Output selection, filelist parsing, and progress callbacks are critical paths with limited documented behavior and edge-case coverage.

tasks.task: Map CLI option handling and output backend selection paths.
Document filelist parsing and progress callback behavior.
Add tests for output selection and filelist edge cases.

test.assertions: Filelist parsing matches documented behavior across quoting and options.

item.title: [REF] Song parser and directives mapping
item.justification: Directive coverage is broad but not fully mapped. Edge directives and metadata normalization behavior need documentation and tests.

tasks.task: Catalog directive handlers and map to element output.
Document metadata normalization and directive precedence.
Add tests for edge directives and mixed metadata cases.

test.assertions: Directive outputs match documented element structure.

item.title: [REF] Chord parsing and transposition mapping
item.justification: Chord parsing supports multiple notation systems and transposition rules that are not fully mapped, increasing regression risk for notation-specific features.

tasks.task: Document chord token parsing and naming conventions.
Map transposition rules and notation-specific conversions.
Add tests for roman, nashville, and solfege edge cases.

test.assertions: Notation conversions produce expected symbols and accidentals.

item.title: [REF] Legacy and auxiliary backend parity
item.justification: Legacy backends vary in feature coverage. Without a parity matrix, regressions are hard to detect and behavior differences are undocumented.

tasks.task: Inventory element handlers across PDF/HTML/Text/LaTeX/JSON/MMA/ChordPro/Debug/Meta.
Document known gaps and intended behavior differences.
Add baseline tests for at least PDF and Text output.

test.assertions: Selected backends render core song elements without errors.

item.title: [REF] Markdown backend coverage
item.justification: Markdown backend handler coverage and representations for diagrams and delegates are not fully documented or tested.

tasks.task: Audit Markdown handler coverage against ChordProBase elements.
Define representation for diagrams, grids, and delegate outputs.
Add or extend tests for Markdown output coverage.

test.assertions: All core elements have valid Markdown representations.

item.title: [REF] Chord diagrams and grids mapping
item.justification: Diagram and grid rendering involve multiple components and font resources. Coverage and variants (keyboard diagrams, repeats) are only partially mapped.

tasks.task: Map diagram generation flow and SVG rendering paths.
Document grid syntax handling and repeat markers.
Add tests for keyboard diagrams and grid repeats.

test.assertions: Diagram outputs match expected SVG or textual format.

item.title: [REF] Delegate integration contracts
item.justification: Delegate integration relies on external tools and internal IO contracts that are not fully specified, with minimal automated coverage.

tasks.task: Document delegate input/output contracts and file handling.
Map error handling for missing tools and failed conversions.
Add integration tests for ABC and LilyPond delegates.

test.assertions: Delegates produce renderable output or clear errors.

item.title: [REF] Wx GUI workflow mapping
item.justification: GUI workflows and state transitions are not fully documented, and automated tests are uncertain. Mapping reduces regression risk for UI changes.

tasks.task: Document main GUI workflows: open, edit, preview, print.
Map configuration and output settings used by the GUI.
Create a manual test checklist for GUI regression.

test.assertions: GUI workflows complete without errors and outputs match CLI behavior.

item.title: [REF] Configuration system mapping
item.justification: Config precedence, restricted hashes, and overrides affect most features. The behavior is not fully documented and lacks dedicated tests.

tasks.task: Document config layering and precedence rules.
Map restricted hash behavior and error cases.
Add tests for override merging and invalid key handling.

test.assertions: Overrides apply in correct order and errors are surfaced clearly.

item.title: [REF] Documentation coverage mapping
item.justification: Docs site covers core usage but advanced configuration and backend-specific behavior are incomplete. Mapping gaps helps prioritize documentation work.

tasks.task: Audit docs coverage against existing features and config keys.
Document backend selection and HTML5 print configuration.
Build docs site and verify new content renders.

test.description: Build docs site with Hugo and review output.
test.assertions: New sections render correctly and navigation is updated.

changelog.entry: Initial code analysis; generated overview.xml and created 10 [REF] items.
